question: Who of the following assisted Bhagat Singh during the time of Central Assembly Bombing?
explanation: Central Assembly Bombing took place in the year 1929 (8th April). Bhagat Singh and Batukeswar Dutt threw a bomb into the assembly with the slogan ‘Inquilab Zindabad’. After that, they started throwing Papamphlets into the hall. Bhagat Singh took inspiration from Auguste Vaillant who threw a bomb into the French Chamber of Deputies in 1893.
